Search will find Records that contain your search term or string to any field in the Context record.

select1.label: Tap Context ID in list below to load it.
Tap Feature in list below to load it.

input.label: Use this tab to enter relationships between contexts, eg ‘Above’ and ‘Below’. Select the Type of Relationship on the left, the related Context from the list on the right, and click the button ‘Relate Contexts’.

item.label: Here you can enter filenames or unique reference numbers for image stored on another device.

trigger.label: Save and Duplicate {Context} (will not duplicate relationships, samples, or artefact groups).

input.label: Use this tab to enter relationships between Features, eg ‘Above’ and ‘Below’. Select the Type of Relationship on the left, the related Feature from the list on the right, and click the button ‘Relate Features'.

item.label: Here you can enter filenames or unique reference numbers for image stored on another device.
